attributes.title: github_issues_comments_feelings_help
attributes.visState:
{"aggs":[],"params":{"fontSize":12,"markdown":"#### GitHub Issues Comments and Collaboration (with feelings)

* **Number of issue comments** gives an idea of the activity at different levels, from Project to individuals.
* **Collaboration Network** shows people as nodes. Node size is the number of issues they created. Edges link people commenting on the same issue thread. Edge size represents the number of comments.
* **Tables issues/comments** offer a view of the comments activity split by project, repository, and individual, allowing to compare among them.
* **Emotions pie chart/tables** provide an overview of the emotions in the project (e.g., anger, fear, joy) plus details at repository and issue levels.
* **Sentiment pie chart/tables** provide an overview of the sentiment in the project (e.g., positive, negative) plus details at repository and issue levels.

**Note**: 

 Ratios are calculated as specific count (`+1` or `all reactions`) divided by total count (`issues + comments`).

 Sentiment and emotions data is calculated using the [CROSS-NLP-REST-API](https://github.com/chaoss/grimoirelab/tree/master/third-party#docker-image-cross-nlp-rest-api)

[See complete dashboard documentation](https://chaoss.github.io/grimoirelab-sigils/panels/github-issues-comments-feelings)"},"title":"github_issues_comments_feelings_help","type":"markdown"}
